name: A GUITARGODDESS Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 4-letter word for an animal similar to a frog.
questions.explanation:
Toad.

	Both frogs and toads are animals known as amphibians.  There are many different kinds of frogs and toads.  Some people say that toads can cause warts!

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 3-letter word for a being that a religious person worships.
questions.explanation:
God.

	Many people worship different gods.  Some people worship just one god, some people worship two or three, and some people worship hundreds of gods.  Some people don't worship a god at all!

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 3-letter word for a canine.
questions.explanation:
Dog.

	A dog is an animal known as a canine.  They are often called man's best friend.  They are very commonly used as pets.

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 5-letter word for something that can be added to tea to make it sweet.
questions.explanation:
Sugar.

	Sugar comes in many different forms, such as brown or white refined.  The white sugar is commonly known as table sugar, which is used to sweeten many things, like tea or coffee.

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 4-letter word for something a businessman would wear, that comes with pants and a jacket.
questions.explanation:
Suit.

	A suit is an outfit that has a matching pair of pants and a jacket.  Oftentimes, a third piece, called a vest, is added.  Suits come in all different colors and designs.  Some are dark, like a solid black suit, and others are wild and crazy, like a striped orange and yellow suit!

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 5-letter word for a piece of clothing a woman might wear, or a word meaning to put clothes on.
questions.explanation:
Dress.

	To dress is to put clothes on.  You can also use the word "don" to mean "get dressed".  A woman sometimes wears a dress, which is an outfit that is sort of like a shirt and a skirt attached in one piece to make a whole outfit!

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 5-letter word for a game where you throw sharp things at a target to get a bullseye.
questions.explanation:
Darts.

	Darts is a game where you throw a sharp, pointy object, known as a dart, at a target.  You get a certain score based on where you hit the target.  A bullseye gets you 25 points, and a double bullseye will get you 50 points!

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 3-letter word for a small piece of fabric used to wash things.
questions.explanation:
Rag.

	A rag is like a small towel that can be used to clean things.  Rags are used to clean dishes, where it is called a dishrag.  They are also used to clean your body in the shower, when it is called a washrag.

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 5-letter word meaning to look at something without blinking.
questions.explanation:
Stare.

	To stare means to look without blinking, and another word for stare is "ogle".  Some people like to have staring contests, where they see who can look at the other person without blinking the longest.

questions.text: Using only letters in "GUITARGODDESS", find a 3-letter word meaning to combine two numbers together to find the sum.
questions.explanation:
Add.

	When you add two numbers together, you are combining them to find the sum.  For instance, if I "add" 2 and 2, I get the sum of 4.  Adding is one of the four main functions in math.  The others are subtract, divide, and multiply.
